content:
# The attempt to craft stone furnaces failed because we did not gather the necessary intermediate resource, which is stone. 
# Stone is required to craft stone furnaces, and it seems we have not collected any yet.

# Step 6: Locate the nearest stone resource and move there.
stone_position = nearest(Resource.Stone)  
move_to(stone_position)  # Move to the nearest stone patch.

# Step 7: Harvest stone to collect the necessary materials for crafting.
harvested_stone = harvest_resource(stone_position, quantity=10)  # Harvest 10 stone.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Display updated inventory.
